output.sentences: It was a worldwide sporting event.
The crowd came out to cheer for their favorite player, Manny Ramirez.
They came out to wave and cheer and even to support the coaching staff.
There were some in the crowd who had other ideas and made extremely rude gestures.
In the end, the fans were thrilled with the outcome of the day.
